mobiles.name: Jher
mobiles.long_description: Jher looks into your eyes, and freezes you with his stare.
mobiles.description: You feel incredibly overwhelmed by the power in this evil man's eyes.

mobiles.name: warg young
mobiles.long_description: A young warg notices you and grins evilly.
mobiles.description: He has been waiting for you to practice his newly learned skill of thievery.

mobiles.name: knanath
mobiles.long_description: Knanath, Jher's pet, bares his fangs as he lunges at your throat.
mobiles.description: If Knanath hasn't ripped your throat out by now, he must not be hungry.

mobiles.name: adult mother warg
mobiles.long_description: An adult warg stands here surrounded by small warg children.
mobiles.description:
Stay away from her children or she will protect them more viciously than you 
could imagine.

mobiles.name: warg father
mobiles.long_description: A large warg stands here looking for anything to attack for fun.
mobiles.description: Don't mess with this beast, he will kill you before you can scream.

mobiles.name: young hungry warg
mobiles.long_description: A young warg huddles under the light of the torch and sucks on a bone.
mobiles.description: He looks at you and licks his chops.  Obviously he would rather suck on you.

mobiles.name: snake
mobiles.long_description: A snake senses your fear with his tongue as he wraps himself around your legs.
mobiles.description: You see venom dripping off its fangs.

mobiles.name: beorn
mobiles.long_description: A huge black bear is hidden in the shadows.
mobiles.description: Beorn looks at you and says 'will you help me kill Jher?'

mobiles.name: bat
mobiles.long_description: A bat swoops down at your face.
mobiles.description:
You can see his black eyes, and hear his sonic screech as he judges the 
distance between it and you.

mobiles.name: Htrag warg breeder
mobiles.long_description: Htrag is here tending to the newly born warg litter.
mobiles.description:
Htrag looks back at you and flashes his fangs because he knows what he and 
these new pups will feast on.

mobiles.name: female warg breeder
mobiles.long_description: A female warg shies against the far wall of the cage.
mobiles.description: She growls at you and screams for help.

mobiles.name: male warg breeder
mobiles.long_description: The male breeder warg jumps to rip your throat out.
mobiles.description:
You see a creature with huge fangs dripping drool.  He is covered in matted 
brown hair and his eyes glow.

mobiles.name: Sapth slave
mobiles.long_description: Sapth, Jher's slave, looks to you for help.
mobiles.description: His eyes are pleading for someone to free him from Jher's bondage.

mobiles.name: left huge warg guard
mobiles.long_description: A huge warg stands to the left of the door guarding whatever is inside.
mobiles.description: Obviously a warrior, this beast was bred to fight and kill.

mobiles.name: right huge warg guard
mobiles.long_description: A huge warg stands to the right of the door guarding whatever is inside.
mobiles.description: Obviously a warrior, this beast was bred to fight and kill.

mobiles.name: shaanh
mobiles.long_description: Shaanh, Jher's love slave, cowers in the corner.
mobiles.description:
She is wearing close to nothing and she has marks and slashes all over her 
body from some unthinkable torture.

mobiles.name: fish hideous one-eyed
mobiles.long_description: A hideous creature with one blind eye and a huge mouth swims between your legs.
mobiles.description:
The fish is disgusting.  It has one clouded eye, but it can sense you're there 
because of your distinct smell.

old_objects.name: pile of gold
old_objects.description: A small glistening pile of gold catches your eye.

old_objects.name: bone key
old_objects.description: A hard white key was left on the floor.

old_objects.name: breeding formula
old_objects.description: Special warg breeding formula was left here.

old_objects.name: curved dagger jher's
old_objects.description: Jher's evil curved dagger is here glowing.

old_objects.name: breeding formula
old_objects.description: Special warg breeding formula was left here.

old_objects.name: breeding formula
old_objects.description: Special warg breeding formula was left here.

old_objects.name: beorn's fury
old_objects.description: A huge set of teeth are rotting like a skull in the desert.

old_objects.name: key
old_objects.description: A large brass key shimmers here.

old_objects.name: throne
old_objects.description: A huge golden throne covered in jewels.

old_objects.name: key jewel topaz
old_objects.description: A key made of some fine cut amber colored jewell is on the floor.

old_objects.name: carved ebony figurine
old_objects.description: You can barely make out a small black rock under all the dust.

old_objects.name: dusty golden trunk chest
old_objects.description: A large dusty trunk was left in the corner, looks like a good place to sit.

old_objects.name: broken scroll
old_objects.description: A bound roll of paper is hidden here.

old_objects.name: glowing zapath necklace
old_objects.description: A necklace carved from a blood red stone was left here.

old_objects.name: gold pill coin
old_objects.description: A small gold coin catches your eye here.

rooms.name: Descent into the Lair of Jher
rooms.description:
As you descend deeper into the lair, you hear the sound of howling 
wargs.  You feel a tingling in your back, and the hair on the back of your 
neck stands on end.

rooms.name: Mouth of a Cave
rooms.description:
You see an eerie crack in the mountain face.  Some strange power 
creates an urge to explore further.

rooms.name: Descent into the Lair of Jher
rooms.description:
As you descend deeper into this realm of unknown, you sense an 
impending danger and reconsider your travel into the darkness.  Only if you 
are among the strong will you continue.

rooms.name: A Room in the Cave
rooms.description:
This room is lit by torches, but even brighter are the eyes of the 
wargs that come to this room to feast.  These creatures are unique because 
they are continuously hungry.  This is not a good place to be.  Your gaze 
passes from a young warg's glowing eyes to his drooling mouth.

rooms.name: A Room in the Cave
rooms.description:
This room stinks of warg defecation.  The room is also scattered about 
with bones from old kills.  One dim torch in the corner provides the only 
light.  You feel very frightened.  As you look in disgust at the bones, you can
see the traces of a trapdoor underneath.

exits.description: A trapdoor is buried under a pile of bones.

rooms.name: Small Treasure Room
rooms.description:
Before you came along this room had not seen light since Jher was only 
a young man studying the ways of taming the wild.  Your eyes are stunned by a 
glistening pile of gold at your feet.  Once you can pry your eyes away from 
the pile of gold, you notice the snakes slithering up and around your legs.

rooms.name: An Unlit Hallway
rooms.description:
As you journey deeper into the cave, the sounds of howling get louder. 
However, the only thing you can hear is the sound of your pounding heart.  The 
hallway continues west, but you also see a crack you may be able to pass 
through to the south.  You hear the sound of bats flapping overhead.

rooms.name: A Crack in the Wall
rooms.description:
For some unknown reason, you have decided to explore this crack.  The 
thing you never know about caves is when you might fall into a bottomless pit.
You hear the dripping of an underground stream, and think about the horrible 
things that may be swimming or growing in it.

rooms.name: The Disgusting Underground Pool
rooms.description:
You find youself up to your waist in muck.  The stench is overwhelming 
and you have the urge to vomit, but are afraid what creatures that might 
attract.

rooms.name: The Disgusting Underground Pool
rooms.description: You are waist deep in muck.  The stench is overwhelming.

rooms.name: The Disgusting Underground Pool
rooms.description: You are waist deep in muck.  The stench is overwhelming.

rooms.name: The Disgusting Underground Pool
rooms.description: You are waist deep in muck.  The stench is overwhelming.

rooms.name: An Unlit Hallway
rooms.description:
The celing of this hall is getting higher.  You do not have to be in a 
crouch as you walk.  As you straighten your back and look ahead you see the 
most hideous thing you have ever seen.

rooms.name: Breeding Room
rooms.description:
You see two cages, one to the north, and one to the south.  The 
screaming and howling from the two cages blend together into a terrifying 
sound which brings you to the border of insanity.

rooms.name: The Male Warg Holding Cage
rooms.description:
The animals in this cage, jump at you as you open the cage door.  The 
door you just opened provides the fastest route to the female cage across the 
room.  These disgusting wargs never get enough of two things, food and female 
wargs.  You may have just provided them with both.

rooms.name: The Female Warg Holding Cage
rooms.description:
These female wargs are in absolute terror of the males in the cage 
across the room.  As you entered this cage, they mistake you for a male sent 
in to proliferate the dirty warg race.  However once they realize it is only 
you, they try to remember when the last time they ate was.

rooms.name: A Further Descent
rooms.description:
This path is totally devoid of light.  As you keep walking west you 
bump into a slimy wall and by feeling determine that the tunnel now turns 
southward.

rooms.name: A Further Descent
rooms.description:
After making the turn southwards, you are dismayed to discover that 
once again the tunnel goes down.  But you are comforted because you know that 
you have at least made it this far alive.

rooms.name: The Passage to the Throne Room
rooms.description:
As you reach the bottom of your climb you straighten up and look 
northwards.  There is a huge wood and iron door, with a round brass handle.  
There are two large warg warriors standing guard at either side of this door.
To get by, you will either have to kill them or sneak by and pick the lock.

rooms.name: Southern end of the Throne Room
rooms.description:
This must be a throne room.  The ruler of these wargs must be very 
wealthy, but he also must be cruel to live in such luxury while all his slaves 
suffer.

rooms.name: Northern End of the Throne Room
rooms.description:
There is a huge throne made of the finest gold and glistening with the 
finest jewels.  Even with all this brightness, you are overwhelmed by darkness,
for Jher sits on the throne.

rooms.name: Jher's Bedroom
rooms.description:
This is where Jher sleeps.  To avoid the chance of the wargs attacking 
him in anger while he sleeps, he specially bred Knanath to protect him.  The 
bedroom is dark, for Jher loves the darkness.  Above the bed you see a hole to 
another tunnel.  This was to be his escape route if was ever trapped in his 
room.

rooms.name: Tunnel Above Jher's Bedroom
rooms.description:
This tunnel has never been used because Jher never had the need.  
After the climb up here, it levels off and turns south.

rooms.name: A Small Tunnel
rooms.description:
Since Jher had never used this tunnel, he never paid any attention to 
its upkeep.  You have to crawl now, and as you crawl, you seem to be ascending.

rooms.name: The Secret Room
rooms.description:
When you finally make it to this room, you are incredibly exhausted.  
You sit down to rest on an old trunk.  As you sit, you brush aside some dust 
on the trunk.  The shine from your light off the golden chest is blinding.  As 
you try to open it, you realize in disappointment that it is locked.  
However 
if you look around, you may find something hidden that will open it.
